name: Dialer For WhatsApp & WA-enabled Businesses List
description: Got a number you want to contact via WhatsApp but dont want to add as contact?  This app is for you!  Dialer For WhatsApp includes the familiar dialer where you input the number, hit the WhatsApp button, and viola - WhatsApp opens chat with that number! You can also quickly contact via WhatsApp anyone from your call logs too!  Features  Beautiful, slick dialer, just like the one which comes with Android.  Phone calls history.  WA Dialer history.  WhatsApp Business support!  Tired of Ads? No ads at all in this app!  This app is provided to you by Wabi - Website: http://www.wabi-app.com Email: wabi-wad@applaud-software.com  More Apps by Wabi: Wabi - Phone number for WhatsApp Business  Note: This app uses the official WhatsApp API, and is not in any way affiliated with WhatsApp or Facebook.
